name: Stone
description:
Stone is produced by the Stonecutter Camp from a Quarry.
It is currently used in the construction of the following buildings:
Sawmill (10)
Well (5)
Warehouse (5)
Windmill (10)
Bakery (20)
Sheep Farm (20)
Stone is also used for the construction and the upgrading of houses. They can also be traded via Trade Routes.
